name: beancount-pulsar
description: A Pulsar package for Beancount - Plain Text Accounting

ledger.title: Bean Ledger
ledger.description: Specify your 'main' ledger, if applicable. For example if you `include` your ledgers into another ledger, place the path of your main ledger here. Leave it blank to run commands on the current file. Affects the `bean-check` and `fava` commands.

beanformat.title: Bean Format
beanformat.description: Settings for the Beancount formatter. See `bean-format --help` for details.

enable.title: Enable Bean Format
enable.description: Whether to enable the formatter. Note: `bean-format` must be installed on your system.

path.title: Bean Format Path
path.description: If the `bean-format` executable is not in your PATH, specify the location here. For example: `/home/user/bean-format`.

column.title: Bean Format Currency Column
column.description: Align currencies to this column. A value of `0` will align currencies automatically based on the prefix width and numbers width.

prefix.title: Bean Format Prefix Width
prefix.description: Force a fixed prefix width. A value of `0` will use the default prefix width.

num-width.title: Bean Format Number Width
num-width.description: Force a fixed numbers width. A value of `0` will use the default numbers width.

beancheck.title: Bean Check
beancheck.description: Settings for Bean Check. See `bean-check --help` for details.

enable.title: Enable Bean Check
enable.description: Whether to enable Bean Check. Note: `bean-check` must be installed on your system.

path.title: Bean Check Path
path.description: If the `bean-check` executable is not in your PATH, specify the location here. For example: `/home/user/bean-check`.

fava.title: Fava
fava.description: Settings for Fava. See `fava --help` for details.

enable.title: Enable Fava
enable.description: Whether to enable Fava. Note: `fava` must be installed on your system.

path.title: Fava Path
path.description: If the `fava` executable is not in your PATH, specify the location here. For example: `/home/user/fava`.

port.title: Fava Port
port.description: Specify the port to use for `fava`.

browser.title: Open External Browser
browser.description: Whether to open your default browser after the server starts.

delay.title: Fava Start Delay
delay.description: Due to the nature of Node's `child_process`, a small delay is needed to start the server. If the 'Server Started' notification is displaying _before_ 'Server Starting', increase the time. Time is in milliseconds.
